text: ai eemaanadaaron khuda tumhen hukm deta hai ki logon kee amaanaten amaanat rakhane vaalon ke havaale kar do aur jab logon ke baahamee jhagadon ka phaisala karane lago to insaaf se phaisala karo (khuda tumako) isakee kya hee achchhee naseehat karata hai isamen to shak nahin ki khuda sabakee sunata hai (aur sab kuchh) dekhata hai
